products.name: Vintage Typewriter
products.review: This typewriter looks good in your living room.

products.name: Vintage Typewriter
products.review: I bought this typewriter for my son. Todays keyboards just don't teach the necessary finger strength a man must learn to survive! Everytime I hear him trembling his fingers on the table like droplets of warm goat poop falling on a bed of grass I can't help but think to myself: How could those feeble hands ever win a negotiation? Luckily I came across this vintage typewriter requiring a minimum of 15 Newtonmeters of force before a letter is typed. Ever since forcing him to four hours of daily uninterrupted typewriter-typing I got to watch his fingers swell in force, as did his manlihood. Unfortunately some of the colour is flaking off, but definitely worth the purchase!

products.name: Vintage Camera Lens
products.review: You won't have a camera to use it and it probably doesn't work anyway.

products.name: Vintage Camera Lens
products.review: No matter what I try I can't seem to connect it to my computer. All the pictures I took are still on the device! I really wish they would have made this clear inside the manual. I'd like to speak to the manager, please.

products.name: Home Barista Kit
products.review: Always wanted to brew coffee with Chemex and Aeropress at home?

products.name: Home Barista Kit
products.review: Keeps its promises. I got my Home Barista Kit last week ago and began the procedure immediately. After painfully preparing a cup of coffee every other hour, I can confirm it finally worked! I grew a luscious, glorious beard and tattoos on my arms. Drinking all that shitty coffee turned out to be worth it.

products.name: Home Barista Kit
products.review: I never liked coffee, its what I imagine devils spit tastes like. But damn does this thing look good in my kitchen, I tell you that.

products.name: Terrarium
products.review: This terrarium will looks great in your white painted living room.

products.name: Terrarium
products.review: Fun terrarium. It's spacious, empty and comes in a rectangle form as advertised. Me and my Husband couldn't be happier! It fits him just enough to be comfortable and I finally get the bed back to myself...

products.name: Terrarium
products.review: They moved in a few days ago and have not left ever since! I miss them

products.name: Film Camera
products.review: Really an amazing image this little fella throws on the wall but not including a charging cable is just a little bit of bad taste in my honest opinion. Stars lost.

products.name: Film Camera
products.review: This technology bears huge potential. I used it on my grandson. Now I have two grandsons!

products.name: Film Camera
products.review: This camera looks like it's a film camera, but it's actually digital.

products.name: Vintage Record Player
products.review: It still works.

products.name: Vintage Record Player
products.review: Yo this shit whack, no spotify support

products.name: Vintage Record Player
products.review: Very impressive. Above-average sound quality for a piece of such age. Makes itself wonderfully on top of my chimney.

products.name: Metal Camping Mug
products.review: You probably don't go camping that often but this is better than plastic cups.

products.name: Metal Camping Mug
products.review: Great mug, multipurpose ready. Can also be used while in a car, not camping exclusive. Carries a large variety of liquids, but does not leak. Impressive!

products.name: Metal Camping Mug
products.review: My wife left me. My kids hate me. Everything and everyone was gone. But this mug. It has been at my side for the past years, during my darkest moments. It travelled with me over mountains and rivers, never leaving my side. I would buy it again. Maybe marry again.

products.name: City Bike
products.review: This single gear bike probably cannot climb the hills of San Francisco.

products.name: City Bike
products.review: It gets me from A to B while looking unspectacular enough for nobody to bother even trying to steal it. Its shittiness is its camouflage.

products.name: City Bike
products.review: Broke down soon after I left the path, can't even take a proper dirt road. Very disappointing.

products.name: Air Plant
products.review: Have you ever wondered whether air plants need water? Buy one and figure out.

products.name: Air Plant
products.review: This air-plant may look innocent enough on the pictures, but you better know what you're in for before purchasing one of these little badboys. If you miss your trimming window they WILL grow and take over your entire house. They start at one room laying their roots all over the place before expanding out in all directions. Fun plant, but using these puppy pictures to advertise this beast does not do it justice.

products.name: Air Plant
products.review: Quite a nice plant unfortunately not potty trained.
